channel.title: [Deathlypvpz] Getting Christmas cracker working!
channel.description: So, i follow all the steps of the tutorial [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=469498.0]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=469498.0[/url] , compile, its all great, then i do the last step, click compile and get an error when i add [code]packetId[14] = new ItemOnPlayer();[/code] Where do i add it and how, i want pcrackers to work, it keeps giving me an error on this step, i changed packet size and everyting!

item.title: [Deathlypvpz] Getting Christmas cracker working!
item.dc:creator: @Danielson183 Danielson183
item.description:
@Danielson183 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:534898”][quote author=Danielson183 link=topic=653701.msg4379541#msg4379541 date=1383096334]

You add that into packethandler.java under: static {

Gives me, error, cannot find symbol…
[/quote]
Can you post the error? You probably didn’t import ItemOnPlayer.

Put this at the top along with all the other imports:
import server.model.players.packets.ItemOnPlayer;[/quote]
Omg, how stupid of me, THANKS MAN!

Read full topic

item.title: [Deathlypvpz] Getting Christmas cracker working!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Danielson183, post:3, topic:534898”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=653701.msg4379539#msg4379539 date=1383095773]
You add that into packethandler.java under: static {
[/quote]
Gives me, error, cannot find symbol…[/quote]
Can you post the error? You probably didn’t import ItemOnPlayer.

Put this at the top along with all the other imports:
import server.model.players.packets.ItemOnPlayer;

Read full topic
